item.title: Mirror, the Forgotten Parenting Buddy
item.description: Dad : “Son, can you look who’s that?” Son : …still cryng after his tantrum, he looked at the mirror. “He looks… bad” Dad : “Well boy, that one there is angry!” Knowing yourself is hard. Heck, it’s even harder for children. And as a parent, it is such a constant struggle. I hate myself when yelling to him.
